DOC.brief_summary: The VISN1 VA Hepatitis C Testing Linkage Care Quality Improvement project aim : ( 1 ) increase proportion Veterans test HCV born 1945-1965 vulnerable , high-risk group , ( 2 ) Increase linkage specialize HCV care among VISN 1 VA Veterans diagnose HCV infection , ( 3 ) Evaluate whether race , ethnicity , gender , marker social disparity influence completion HCV test linkage specialty care , whether disparity reduce plan VISN 1 VA HCV Quality Improvement ( QI ) program . The central focus reduce delay diagnosis linkage treatment evaluation , management comorbidities contraindication , subsequent initiation .
DOC.brief_title: Hepatitis C Testing VA Community-Based Outpatient Clinics
DOC.detailed_description: The VISN1 VA Hepatitis C Testing Linkage Care Quality Improvement project aim : ( 1 ) increase proportion Veterans test HCV born 1945-1965 vulnerable , high-risk group , ( 2 ) Increase linkage specialize HCV care among VISN 1 VA Veterans diagnose HCV infection , ( 3 ) Evaluate whether race , ethnicity , gender , marker social disparity influence completion HCV test linkage specialty care , whether disparity reduce plan VISN 1 VA HCV Quality Improvement ( QI ) program . The central focus reduce delay diagnosis linkage treatment evaluation , management comorbidities contraindication , subsequent initiation .
DOC.criteria: Veterans Born period 19451965 ( `` birth cohort '' ) With outpatient visit primary care VISN1 facility FY 2016
